text:
FLEXPORT | SF,CA | FTE, ONSITE, VISA XFER OK | 20+ Openings | #GHC2018 #shecodes #girlswhocode #womenintech #ally #LGBTQfriendly Exciting times at Flexport! We're hiring product-focused full-stack engineers who are language agnostic.

Our mission is to make global trade easy for everyone. We are revolutionizing a trillion dollar industry that touches every country on the planet, which means solving complex business challenges. We are looking for makers who love learning, are passionate about collaborating, and desire to see the global impact of the solutions they build.

Tech Stack: Frontend - React, Relay, Flow, Jest, Enzyme; Mobile: React Native, Apollo; Backend - Ruby on Rails, Postgres, GraphQL, Python, RSpec; CI - GitHub, Buildkite; Infra - AWS, Python

Eng Culture - www.keyvalues.com/flexport

Software Eng = https://grnh.se/ba91da6c1
